item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is Javier Ar√©valo Baeza, I was born in sunny Spain in the year 1970. I have been making videogames for over 25 years, and I intend to keep doing that for as long as I can. Other places you can reach me: Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheJare Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheJare Github: https://github.com/TheJare Google+: https://plus.google.com/109393462510769944302/
